quotes: Paise kamao, lekin sthayi tareeke se 🌱
Paise secure karna sirf shauk nahi, yeh bhi self-care hai 💅
Tumhare finance ko vibe check pass nahi karna, bas behtar hona hai 📈
Plot twist: Tum ab paise ko sahi tareeke se sambhalne wale ho 💸
Budget wali zindagi jee rahe hain, koi shak nahi ✨
Main character ki energy hai paise ko manage karna 💫
Yeh financial freedom ki vibes de raha hai 🔥
Kha bhi rahe hain aur bacha bhi rahe hain 🍜
Dost, aapki paison ki journey yahi se shuru hoti hai ✌️
Yeh tumhara villain era hai karz ko crush karne ka 😈
FullScreenLoader.initialQuote: Kha bhi rahe hain aur bacha bhi rahe hain 🍜
FullScreenLoader.loading: Aapke vitteey bhavishya ko load kiya ja raha hai...

install.title: Humara App Install Karein

description.default: Sarvottam anubhav ke liye, hum aapko apni home screen par shettayyy app ko install karne ki salah dete hain!

ios.title: iOS par yeh app install karne ke liye:

steps.1: Safari mein Share button par tap karein
steps.2: Niche scroll karein aur "Add to Home Screen" par tap karein
steps.3: Confirm karne ke liye "Add" par tap karein

ios.step2: Niche scroll karein aur "Add to Home Screen" par tap karein
ios.step3: Confirm karne ke liye "Add" par tap karein

android.step1: Browser menu button par tap karein
android.step2: "Install app" ya "Add to Home screen" par tap karein

install.learnMore: App install karne ke baare mein aur adheek jaane

installGuide.title: App install karne ke liye nirdesh
installGuide.description: Apne device par hamara app install karne ke liye in video guide ka paalan karein. Prasangik nirdesh dekhne ke liye apna platform chunen.
installGuide.noGuides: Chune huwey platform ke liye app install karne ke liye no nirdesh karne ke liye.

errorList.item2: Pramanikaran link ki samay seema samapt ho gayi hai
errorList.item3: Sign-in ke dauran ek takneeki samasya thi

buttons.tryAgain: Phir se sign in karne ka prayas karein

PrivacyPolicyPage.introText: Edenomics mein, hum aapki gopniyata aur aapke vittiya data ki suraksha ko atyant gambhirta se lete hain. Yeh gopniyata neeti batati hai ki hum aapki vyaktigat vitt prabandhan application ka upyog karte samay aapki jankari ko kaise ekatr, upyog, prakat aur surakshit karte hain.
PrivacyPolicyPage.informationWeCollect: Jo Jankari Hum Ekatr Karte Hain

personalInfoList.item4: Len-den ka itihas aur kharch ke pattern

PrivacyPolicyPage.howWeUse: Aapki Jankari Ka Upyog Kaise Karte Hain
PrivacyPolicyPage.weUseYourInfo: Hum aapki jankari ka upyog karte hain:

useInfoList.item1: Hamari vittiya prabandhan sevaein pradan karne aur banaye rakhne ke liye
useInfoList.item2: Kharch vishleshan aur budget sifarishein taiyar karne ke liye
useInfoList.item3: Hamare application ko behtar banane aur anukoolit karne ke liye
useInfoList.item4: Mahatvapurn update aur suvidhaon ke bare mein samvad karne ke liye
useInfoList.item5: Aapke khate ki suraksha sunishchit karne ke liye

securityList.item1: Sabhi vittiya data ke liye end-to-end encryption
securityList.item2: Niyamit suraksha audit aur penetration testing
securityList.item3: Udyog-manak protocol ka upyog karke surakshit data bhandaran

PrivacyPolicyPage.dataSharingText: Hum aapki vyaktigat jankari ko teesre paksh ko nahi bechte, vyapar nahi karte ya kiraye par nahi dete hain. Hum aapki jankari keval nimnalikhit paristhitiyon mein sajha kar sakte hain:

sharingList.item2: Kanuni dayitvon ka palan karne ke liye
sharingList.item3: Kade gopniyata samjhauton ke tahat seva pradataon ke sath
sharingList.item4: Vilay ya adhigrahan ki sthiti mein (purv suchana ke sath)

rightsList.item6: Kisi bhi samay sahmati vapas lena

PrivacyPolicyPage.contactText: Yadi aapke pas is gopniyata neeti ya hamari prathaon ke bare mein koi prashn hain, to kripya hamse sampark karen:
PrivacyPolicyPage.footerText: Yeh gopniyata neeti parivartan ke adhin hai. Hum aapko kisi bhi mahatvapurn parivartan ke bare mein email ya hamare application ke madhyam se suchit karenge.

acceptance.title: 1. Niyamon ki Swikriti
acceptance.content: Edenomics ("App") ka upyog karke, aap in seva sharton se bandhe hone ke liye sahmat hote hain. Yadi aap in sharton ke kisi bhi hisse se asahmat hain, to aap hamari sevaon ka upyog nahi kar sakte. Hum kisi bhi samay in niyamon ko sanshodhit karne ka adhikar surakshit rakhte hain, jiski suchna app ya email ke madhyam se di jayegi.

description.title: 2. Seva Vivaran
description.intro: Edenomics ek vyaktigat vitt prabandhan application hai jo pradan karta hai:
description.disclaimer: Hum satikta ka prayas karte hain, lekin app ke madhyam se pradan ki gayi kisi bhi vittiya jankari ki purnata, vishwasniyata ya satikta ki guarantee nahi dete hain.

userResponsibilities.title: 3. Upyogkarta ki Zimmedariyan aur Khata Suraksha

items.item1: Aap apne khate ke credentials ki gopniyata banaye rakhne ke liye zimmedar hain
items.item2: Kisi bhi anadhikrit pahunch ya upyog ki turant suchna deni hogi
items.item3: Aap apne khate ke tahat sabhi gatividhiyon ke liye zimmedar hain
items.item4: Aapko mazboot, adwitiya password ka upyog karna chahiye aur jab uplabdh ho to do-karak premanikaran saksham karna chahiye

items.item1: Kisi bhi suraksha suvidhaon ko bypass karne ka prayas
items.item2: App ka upyog kisi bhi avaidh uddeshya ke liye karna
items.item3: Durbhavnapurn code ya samagri upload karna
items.item4: Anya upyogkartaon ke khaton tak pahunchne ka prayas karna

dataPrivacy.title: 4. Data aur Gopniyata
dataPrivacy.intro: App ka aapka upyog hamari gopniyata niti dwara bhi niyantrit hota hai. App ka upyog karke, aap sahmat hote hain ki:

items.item1: Hum aapke vittiya data ko hamari gopniyata niti mein varnit anusar ekatr aur sansadhit kar sakte hain
items.item2: Aap hume apni sevaein pradan karne aur sudhar karne ke liye apne data ka upyog karne ka license pradan karte hain
items.item3: Aap pradan kiye gaye data ki satikta ke liye zimmedar hain
items.item4: Hum vishleshan uddeshyon ke liye anam, ekatrit data sajha kar sakte hain

liability.title: 5. Dayitv aur Asvikaran
liability.disclaimer: App "jaisa hai" pradan kiya jata hai bina kisi prakar ki warranty ke.

items.item1: Hum app ke upyog se hone wale vittiya nuksan ke liye zimmedar nahi hain
items.item2: Hum vittiya salah nahi dete - sabhi antardrashtiyan keval suchnatmak uddeshyon ke liye hain
items.item3: Hamara dayitv pichle 12 mahinon mein seva ke liye bhugtan ki gayi rashi tak simit hai
items.item4: Hum kisi bhi apratyaksh, akasmik ya parinami nuksan ke liye zimmedar nahi hain

termination.title: 6. Samapti
termination.intro: Hum apni sevaon tak pahunch ko samapt ya nilambit karne ka adhikar surakshit rakhte hain:

items.item1: In sharton ke ullanghan ke liye bina purv suchna ke
items.item2: Sandigdh ya dhokhadhadi wali gatividhi ke liye
items.item3: Niskriyata ki vistarit avadhi ke liye
items.item4: Yadi kanun ya niyaman dwara avashyak ho

intellectualProperty.title: 7. Bauddhik Sampada
intellectualProperty.content: App ki sabhi samagri, suvidhaein aur karyakshamta, jismein path, graphics, logo, icon aur software shamil hain lekin inhi tak simit nahi hain, Edenomics ki vishesh sampatti hain aur antarrashtriya copyright, trademark aur anya bauddhik sampada kanunon dwara sanrakshit hain.

governingLaw.title: 8. Shasi Kanun aur Vivad Samadhan
governingLaw.content: Ye shartein us kshetradhikar ke kanunon ke anusar niyantrit aur vyakhya ki jayengi jahan Edenomics apna mukhya vyavsay sthan banaye rakhta hai, iske kanun ke takrav ke pravdhanon ki parvah kiye bina. In sharton se utpann ya sambandhit kisi bhi vivad ko pehle anaupcharik varta ke madhyam se hal karne ka prayas kiya jayega. Yadi vivad 30 dinon ke bhitar varta ke madhyam se hal nahi kiya ja sakta hai, to dono paksh UNCITRAL madhyasthata niyamon ke anusar madhyasthata ke madhyam se vivad ko hal karne ke liye sahmat hain. Madhyasthata ki bhasha angrezi hogi. In sharton mein kuchh bhi humein kisi bhi lagu kshetradhikar mein nishedhagya rahat mangne se nahi rokta hai jahan hamare hiton ki raksha ke liye tatkal rahat avashyak hai.

contact.title: Sampark Karen
contact.intro: In seva ki sharton ke bare mein kisi bhi prashn ke liye, kripya hamse sampark karen:

TermsOfServicePage.footer: Edenomics ka upyog karke, aap svikar karte hain ki aapne in seva ki sharton ko padh liya hai, samajh liya hai aur inse bandhe hone ke liye sahmat hain.
